summary: This is an email chain from August 10, 2019, forwarding an urgent request regarding a potential leak of information from the hospital concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death. It appears to be internal communication about managing sensitive information related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; his death is the topic of the potential hospital leak.

events.title: Email about potential hospital leak
events.description: An email is forwarded regarding an urgent request about a potential leak of information from the hospital concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death.

keyFacts: An urgent request was made on August 10, 2019, regarding a potential leak of information from the hospital about Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The communication is an internal email chain forwarding this sensitive request.
The subject indicates concern about controlling information related to Epstein's death.
